channel.title: cbnet Ping Optimizer on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in cbnet Ping Optimizer on Silviu's Blog

item.title: cbnet Ping Optimizer is killing a site
item.description: Some wise soul decided many moons ago that installing the aforementioned plugin on a site I host is a great ideea. The wise soul is long gone (admining websites for ngo’s as a volunteer is no fun for far too many come and goers:) ) Lately the site was getting more and more sluggish with no apparent reason. I decided to clean a bit the many modules he thought in his wisdom to install.
